channel.title: Can someone send me some transformation
channel.description: codes? i want to be able to wear ghostly and turn into a random ghost. can anyone send me something like that?

item.title: Can someone send me some transformation
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

just do ::pnpc+number to change and if you want peeps to change as well then

add

if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 2635 == true)
{
npcId = 1633;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2635 == false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

2635 is youre item id

then

1633 is the npc id !

add this above

writePlayers();

works for testscape dunno about others …[br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 12:15:22 AM[/size][hr]these are for hats , like a beret , cav , … no platelegs or something

Read full topic
